title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions seem to be distributed based on personal preference, but this should be changed. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. All actions should be reachable from the editor, without the need to switch views.
OB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is missing from the context menu.
EB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' should be available in the context menu.
SR: To reproduce, select text in the editor and check if the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is present in the context menu. If not, switch to the Outline view and check again.
